item.title: Sofa and Loveseat
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.content:encoded:
A sofa is any upholstered seating furniture, with back and armrests, designed to seat two or more people. A loveseat is a small sofa specifically designed for two persons only, usually a couple.

Relax in style in this ultra sophisticated Power Reclining Living Room Collection by Global Furniture featuring posh crystal tufted arms, sleek brushed nickel backlit power button with built in USB charging port and full chaise design for the ultimate in comfort.

Vacuum-clean fabric upholstered products every two weeks to minimize the presence of dust. Use fabric cleansers to lift stains, but please test the cleanser on the back areas of the product first. If washing is necessary, we recommend finding a professional dry cleaner to perform the task. Maintain the shape and elasticity of cushions by patting hard once a week. During rainy or moist seasons or environments, please use a dehumidifier in the space.

In the summertime, the leather’s natural pores will absorb human sweat, producing odor. To resolve this, use a piece of soft and damp cloth to wipe the product. Moreover, always use professional caring agents to protect the leather.

Fabric: 

The Fabric is the heart and soul of any upholstered furniture. At Camerich we offer a wide array of materials sourced from all over the world. Acidents can happen which is why we offer certain series’ of fabric that are Teflon treated for easier maintenance.

Minimize the presence of dust every two weeks, using a piece of soft cloth by gently wiping the surface. If utilizing a vacuum cleaner on a leather surface, be sure to use a soft and gentle brush head so as not to scratch the surface. To get rid of stains, use a soft cloth and leather cleaner. Please do not use a wet cloth or tissue on the leather.

Leather:

Camerich’s supple yet durable genuine premium leather is sourced from the United States, globally renowned for quality leather. Our leathers exceed expectations in form and function. Our rigorous quality control ensures that only the finest selection of leather is chosen for production carefully considering factors such as natural flaw content, tensile strength, and color vibrancy.

LIGHTING

item.title: Foam Sofa & Loveseat
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.content:encoded:
The epitome of modular, modern design’ endless configurations are only limited by your imagination. With subtle details like inlaid contrast piping to highlight the clean edges of Foam Sofa & Loveseat or the optional marble armrests the Foam Sofa & Loveseat is anything but the typical boxy sectional. Constructed of solid birch the tight fitted seat design hides cross woven elastic webbing and high resilient polyurethane foam topped with feather down providing comfort to this sleek, flexible design. Available in sofa and sectional configurations with your choice of fabric (removable) or leather upholstery. Optional wood or marble armrests available in place of a standard upholstered arm

Information

Fabric: 

The Fabric is the heart and soul of any upholstered furniture. At Camerich we offer a wide array of materials sourced from all over the world. Acidents can happen which is why we offer certain series’ of fabric that are Teflon treated for easier maintenance.

Leather:

Camerich’s supple yet durable genuine premium leather is sourced from the United States, globally renowned for quality leather. Our leathers exceed expectations in form and function. Our rigorous quality control ensures that only the finest selection of leather is chosen for production carefully considering factors such as natural flaw content, tensile strength, and color vibrancy.
